title: Talent Acquisition Intern - 3 Months Contract
company_name: Công ty Trách Nhiệm Hữu Hạn Một Thành Viên Thương Mại Thời Trang Tổng Hợp
job_description:
The Talent Acquisition Intern will be responsible for full-life cycle recruiting, employer branding, interviewing, and recruiting activities to support the organization's talent acquisition efforts.
Employer Branding
Experience in creating recruiting strategies
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Detail-oriented and organized approach to work
Ability to work effectively in a team
Knowledge of HR principles and practices
Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources or related field
requirements:
Final year student or recent graduate.
Good English communication skills are preferred.
Proficiency in MS Office - Excel, Word, PowerPoint.
Strong learning attitude.
Able to intern full-time for 6 months: Monday - Friday (8:30 AM - 6:00 PM), off Saturday and Sunday.
